subject: Re: Last nights files,
author: draiga1
full_text:
Snow,

Those are amazing files! You have mentioned them before but this is the first time I got to hear them. Thanks for posting them again. I wasn't around last year when that happened.

~Draiga

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Ok, here is your "evidence" RJ, last year in spring a  girl was killed, her 
> name was Annie Le, back then i was new to this but, got  some great files, 
> which i gave let police hear on DAY  ONE of her being only still missing.  
> Even in the files themselves  some spirits are telling me she is dead, her 
> voice came through, I have tons of  them, these are a few, and yes I left what 
> they say on them, some are clearer  then others, and if the police officer 
> was able to hear them, you should be  able to as well. I don't know why i 
> even bother to worry my head over doubters  anyway.  I posted these to all 
> three lists, because Bruce can  verify what happened  back then too.   You will 
> also  find that the files themselves verify this by the questions asked of  
> them.   Enjoy,  sf 
>
